Title: LyraCache.Net
Description:
A Distribution Memory Cache System
1.Value filter query like DataTable.Select
2.Extension query (custom function)
3.Simple Transaction Supported
4.POCO style
HomeWiki:
Project Description

LyraCache.Net is a Distribution Memory Cache System Hosting by WCF Service

You may ask : "now had Memcached and System.Runtime.Caching, why need it?"

It had new features may help you :

1.support value filter query base on DataTable.Select

2.support extension query (custom function)

3.simple Transaction Supported for query (query lock)

4.POCO stye
